channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Resilient SOAR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Resilient SOAR

item.title: CVE-2019-4579|2024-09-17T02:26:44.851Z -- ibm -- resilient%20soar
item.description: IBM Resilient SOAR 38 uses incomplete blacklisting for input validation which allows attackers to bypass application controls resulting in direct impact to the system and data integrity. IBM X-Force ID: 167236.

item.title: CVE-2021-20567|2024-09-17T04:04:49.071Z -- ibm -- resilient%20soar
item.description: IBM Resilient SOAR V38.0 could allow a local privileged attacker to obtain sensitive information due to improper or nonexisting encryption.IBM X-Force ID: 199239.
